plot: A Chinese Boy in Belfast is visited by his Granny... and a Ghost. She is a Medium, the Ghost wants her back in Hong Kong, but Billy wants her to stay.
title: Granny's Ghost
plot_es: A Chinese Boy in Belfast is visited by his Granny... and a Ghost. She is a Medium, the Ghost wants her back in Hong Kong, but Billy wants her to stay.
plot_en: A Chinese Boy in Belfast is visited by his Granny... and a Ghost. She is a Medium, the Ghost wants her back in Hong Kong, but Billy wants her to stay.
